tree.speaker: Rez
tree.text: ...Okay. I think I escaped those guards. I don't think they saw what I look like...

tree.speaker: Rez
tree.text: At this point, going back right now would be dangerous. Guess I'll loop around this area and hope they give up.

tree.speaker: Rez
tree.text: Shapeshifting in front of everyone like that, what was I thinking...?
